## **About**

::: {.about}

I am a graduate statistician with experience in spatial analysis, survival models, and systematic reviews. I am currently pursuing an M.S. in Statistics at the [University of New Mexico](https://www.unm.edu), and I hold a B.Sc. in Mathematical Science from the [University of Ghana](https://www.ug.edu.gh).

My work focuses on applying statistical methods to public health challenges, with interests in applied methodology, population health, and data-informed policy. I value clear communication, rigorous analysis, and collaborative problem-solving.

:::
